name: Rhythm Pistol
description:
In this hrythm game for Oculus Rift you will shoot the boxes that show and come to you following the rhythm of the music.

You can only shoot the blue boxes with the blue pistol and the red boxes with the red pistol

Game credits

Software and graphics: Josep Pons

Pistol sound: Gun Foley SFX 01 » 9mm Shot.wav by Buckine

Music: Mise Darling
